title: Tachograph records and driver logbooks (ELD/AOBRD)
dataVerified: Driver name, carrier, vehicle, hours of service, driving time, rest periods
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: FMCSA Hours of Service (HOS) compliance. Domain binding verifies carrier/ELD provider. Prevents hours of service fraud (driver fatigue). DOT roadside inspection verification. Prevents logbook tampering.
